bibl.title: The Soulou in Medieval Old Nubian Documents: A Mobile Ethnic or Professional Group?.
Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. The word sulu in twentieth-century Lower Nubia [P. Qasr Ibrim II, 22 = DBMNT 1019; II, 23 = DBMNT 1020; II, 26 = DBMNT 592; II, 21 = DBMNT 1018]. - III. The soulou in medieval Nubia. - Discussion.
bibl.seg: Petra Weschenfelder, The Soulou in Medieval Old Nubian Documents: A Mobile Ethnic or Professional Group?.

Adam Łajtar, Grzegorz Ochała & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVII (Warsaw, 2015) pp. 279-299.

I. Introduction. - II. The word sulu in twentieth-century Lower Nubia [P. Qasr Ibrim II, 22 = DBMNT 1019; II, 23 = DBMNT 1020; II, 26 = DBMNT 592; II, 21 = DBMNT 1018]. - III. The soulou in medieval Nubia. - Discussion.
